steps.title: Ensure Safety
steps.description: Check the scene is safe before approaching the injured person.

steps.title: Control Bleeding
steps.description: If there is bleeding, apply gentle pressure with a clean cloth or bandage.

steps.title: Immobilize the Limb
steps.description: Keep the injured part in the same position. Do not try to straighten or move the bone.

steps.title: Support with Splint
steps.description: If available, place a splint or firm object next to the injured limb to keep it stable.

steps.title: Apply Cold Pack
steps.description: Apply a cold pack or wrapped ice to reduce swelling (never place ice directly on skin).

steps.title: Seek Medical Help
steps.description: Call emergency services immediately and keep the person still until help arrives.
